articles.description: England edge closer to the Rugby World Cup quarter-finals, but do little to impress in a scrappy 34-12 win over Japan in Nice.
articles.title: England claim scrappy win over Japan

articles.description: Dan Evans and Neal Skupski save four match points before winning a nerve-wracking Davis Cup decider against France.
articles.title: Britain reach Davis Cup last eight after thrilling win

articles.description: Fiji beat Australia for just the third time in their history and blow Pool C wide open with a thrilling win at the Rugby World Cup.
articles.title: Fiji beat Australia at World Cup for first time

articles.description: Ronnie O'Sullivan says he never keeps the trophy after winning a fourth straight Shanghai Masters title with an 11-9 win over Luca Brecel.
articles.title: O'Sullivan to give trophy away after Shanghai win

articles.description: Arsenal move fourth in the Premier League by beating winless Everton through Leandro Trossard's 69th-minute strike at Goodison Park.
articles.title: Trossard strike earns Arsenal victory at Everton

articles.description: Carlos Sainz's Singapore win may not herald end of Red Bull's dominance, but it was a race and result that F1 has been waiting for, writes Andrew Benson.
articles.title: 'Turning point? No, but Singapore was fun while it lasted'

articles.description: Watch the moment Great Britain's Dan Evans and Neal Skupski complete a thrilling comeback, saving four match points to beat France and advance to the last eight of the Davis Cup.
articles.title: 'The most extraordinary day of tennis' - GB win Davis Cup thriller

articles.description: Watch the best of Sunday's action at the Rugby world cup, including wins for England, South Africa and Fiji.
articles.title: England win, Fiji beat Australia - Sunday's World Cup action

articles.description: Real Madrid continue their perfect start to the La Liga campaign with victory over Real Sociedad.
articles.title: Real Madrid continue 100% start and return to top

articles.description: Dutchman Michael van Gerwen wins his fifth World Series of Darts title in front of his home fans in Amsterdam.
articles.title: Van Gerwen wins World Series after nine-dart finish
